StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateMcrcContractGoal]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@OrgID int ,@FiscalYear int ,@MissionValue int ,@UserLogin varchar(15))
AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 0 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = 'CMC') BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] SET [MISSION_VALUE] = @MissionValue ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND [MONTH_CODE] = 0 AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE] = 'CMC' END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] ([ORGANIZATION_ID], [FISCAL_YEAR], [MONTH_CODE], [CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE], [MISSION_VALUE], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@OrgID, @FiscalYear, 0, 'CMC', @MissionValue, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
